thread.title: BRIEF-Aecon Issues Statement About Proposed Transaction With CCCC International Holding Limited

title: BRIEF-Aecon Issues Statement About Proposed Transaction With CCCC International Holding Limited

organizations.name: cccc international holding limited reuters staff

text:
February 9, 2018 / 3:07 PM / in 13 minutes BRIEF-Aecon Issues Statement About Proposed Transaction With CCCC International Holding Limited Reuters Staff 
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Aecon Group Inc: 
* AECON ISSUES STATEMENT ABOUT PROPOSED TRANSACTION WITH CCCC INTERNATIONAL HOLDING LIMITED 
* AECON - DOES NOT OWN ANY INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RELATED TO NUCLEAR ENERGY; NOR DOES IT POSSESS OTHER “SENSITIVE PROPRIETARY TECHNOLOGY” 
* AECON GROUP SAYS “FOLLOWING CLOSE OF PROPOSED TRANSACTION WITH CCCI, AECON WILL CONTINUE TO BE LED BY ITS CANADIAN MANAGEMENT TEAM” 
* AECON - CCCI DOES NOT RECEIVE GOVERNMENT SUBSIDIES FOR ITS INTERNATIONAL ACTIVITIES 
* AECON - PROPOSED TRANSACTION WITH CCCI DOES NOT RESULT IN A CANADIAN (OR ANY) CROWN CORPORATION BIDDING AGAINST A PRIVATE CO​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
